title: Introduction to Python for Data Science
subject: Data Science
theory: Python is the dominant language in Data Science due to its simplicity and huge ecosystem (libraries). Jupyter Notebooks are the standard environment for experimentation, allowing code, output, and markdown text to coexist.

examples.explanation: Python's f-strings and dynamic typing make it easy to work with data.

interview_questions.question: Why is Python preferred over C++ for Data Science?
interview_questions.answer: Development speed and rich library support (NumPy, Pandas) outweigh C++'s execution speed. Most Python libraries call C/C++ under the hood anyway.

summary: Python provides the toolset to implement Data Science concepts effectively.
